lyrics.text:
‘E ‘ē, ke u fakasio mai
Ki he kau mālōlō
Kuo hao atu ki he langi,
Pe fēfē ‘enau nofo.

Ke u ‘ilo ‘enau fiefia,
Fanongo ‘enau lau,
He nofo lāngilangi’ia
‘Alofi ‘o e Hau.

Ko futu pe ‘enau mo’ua
He ngaahi faingata’a;
‘O nau fekuki pē ‘i mu’a
Mo e maama angahala

“Na’a mou ikuna ‘i he hā?”
Pea nau tali mai,
“Ko e ta’ata’a ne tafea,
Ko e ivi ‘o e Lami.”

Na’a nau maʻu loto fuapē
‘A e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua;
Nau molomolomuiva’e
Ki honau Takimu’a.

Tau fakamālō ki he ‘Eiki
He tofa hotau hala;
‘O fou he ‘ū mamahi ni,
Ke ma’u ‘a e pule’anga.
